name: How Do I Get Out?!
description:
"How Do I Get Out?!" is a short puzzle game for Gameboy, developed using Chris Maltby's GB Studio. It was made for my nephew for his sixth birthday. 

You play as a giraffe named Shorty trying to find his way out of some old ruins, solving the various puzzles that stand in his way. How will he get out?!

The downloadable file is a Gameboy ROM file, and can thus be played by any Gameboy emulator.

Don't hesitate to let me know if you find any bugs or issues! Thanks for checking it out!
